articles.author: Alexander  Tin
articles.title: Weekly measles cases top 90 in U.S. for first time in years - CBS News
articles.description: Arkansas, Hawaii and Indiana have joined a list of two dozen states with confirmed measles cases.
articles.content: The number of measles cases reported in the U.S. in a single week has topped 90 for the first time since a record wave in 2019, according to figures published Friday by the Centers for Disease Contro… [+3386 chars]
